instruction: theorem DM_2 {n e : ℕ} {G : SimpleGraph V} [Fintype V] [Fintype G.edgeSet] [DecidableEq V] (h₁ : n = Fintype.card V ∧ e = Fintype.card G.edgeSet) (h₂ : ∀ v₁ : V, ∀ v₂ : V, ∃ w : G.Walk v₁ v₂, w.IsHamiltonian) : n ≥ 4 → 2 * e ≥ 3 * n + 1 := by sorry

initialize.expr: theorem DM_2 {n e : ℕ} {G : SimpleGraph V} [Fintype V] [Fintype G.edgeSet] [DecidableEq V] (h₁ : n = Fintype.card V ∧ e = Fintype.card G.edgeSet) (h₂ : ∀ v₁ : V, ∀ v₂ : V, ∃ w : G.Walk v₁ v₂, w.IsHamiltonian) : n ≥ 4 → 2 * e ≥ 3 * n + 1 := by sorry
